titleStmt.title: Plautus's comedies ... made English, with critical remarks upon each play.
Selections. English. 1694
titleStmt.author: Plautus, Titus Maccius.
Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Swalle and T. Child ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the ingenious translator" [i.e., L. Echard] signed: N. Tate.

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
